testsuite.name: Employee Controller Tests

testcase.name: Get All Employees - Should Return All Employees
Get Employees By Name Search - Should Return Matching Employees
Get Employee By ID - Should Return Employee
Create Employee - Should Return Created Employee
Get Highest Salary of Employees - Should Return Highest Salary
Get Top Ten Highest Earning Employee Names - Should Return Employee Names
Delete Employee By ID - Should Return Deleted ID
